attributes.action: Curb the reach of the Health and Safety Executive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wish the Government to curb the reach of the Health and Safety Executive. Yes, we need a body to look after workers in dangerous situations and the like, but to curtail fetes, celebrations, school plays etc., is a step too far. We, so say, live in a free country, which should mean we are free to be responsible for ourselves, a prominent disclaimer should be enough to allow such events to continue. If we continue as it is the H&S will discover that being born is one hundred percent fatal and then where will we be?
